title: Bullion-n-BTC
author: Bullion-n-BTC
content: Working on a 1oz silver enameled art bar physical bitcoin release. Thinking of doing only 5-10 as these take an incredible amount of skill and detail to finish. Each silver bar is ‚Äúfreestyle‚Äù hand painted with the anonymous mask design while the private key will be laser etched onto the reverse, covered with a security hologram, and then the keys enameled onto the bar. To redeem you‚Äôd have to basically destroy the silver bar. Each will come with a custom metal COA. Love the art work and design of these and hope they come out awesome! Keep an eye open for them to drop!
